name: Markdown
body:
### Markdown
- Markdown is essentially a syntax language for formatting text as you write. It’s fast, and built for people who write for the web.
- File generated by Markdown has *.md extension.
- [Official Website](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax)
- Learn the [syntax](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax).

### Markdown tutorial
- [Learning-markdown-write-web-faster](http://www.makeuseof.com/tag/learning-markdown-write-web-faster/)
- [Github Guide](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/)
- [markdown tutorial](http://www.markdowntutorial.com/)
- [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown)

### Markdown Cheatsheets
 - [Cheatsheet](http://markdown-cheatsheet-online)
 - [Cheatsheet by Adam](https://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Cheatsheet)

### Markdown Tools
- Add-on to export Google Doc to Markdown
  - Add-ons >> Get add-ons >> Search ‘Markdown’. [Link](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/export-as-markdown/hbojhdcnbcondcdfpfocpkjkfkbnbdad)  
- [PHP parser to convert md to html] (https://github.com/cebe/markdown)
- Download via composer or otherwise in your directory
- [Example](https://github.com/asifameer/markdown.github.io/tree/master/cebemarkdown)
- Code is   
```php  
<?php
require_once 'vendor\autoload.php';
$parser = new \cebe\markdown\GithubMarkdown();
 // Get contents of markdown.md file in a var $markdown
$markdown = file_get_contents('markdown.md');
// Output html to a var $my_text
$my_text = $parser->parse($markdown);
?>
```

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
